QueryList.Join: <#if value??> <#if like??> and A.value like '%'||:value||'%' <#else> and A.value=:value </#if> </#if> <#if key??> <#if like??> and A.key like '%'||:key||'%' <#else> and A.key=:key </#if> </#if> <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id like '%'||:id||'%' <#else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if parentId??> <#if like??> and A.parentId like '%'||:parentId||'%' <#else> and A.parentId=:parentId </#if> </#if> <#if remark??> <#if like??> and A.remark like '%'||:remark||'%' <#else> and A.remark=:remark </#if> </#if>
QueryList.Query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Dict A WHERE 1=1 @WHERE@
